Thief - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.charactercards
Once given a (existing) color, the game steals from every player 3 students of that color, and puts them back into the students' bag.

TieException - Exception in it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions
This exception is thrown in the rare case a game ends in perfect tie (specifically, two or more players share the same amount of towers left and the same amount of professors owned at the same time).
